Questions.questionText: Which emotional technique does the author use to engage the reader in this sentence: “Sparing kids a daily onslaught of ads for unhealthy foods is as good a place to start as any.”

answers.feedBack: That is not correct. Evocative language, such as the word onslaught, conjures an image of a physical attack consisting of countless weapons, such as arrows or bombs.
